Sublime Package Management¶

Get Sublime Package Control¶

  • Download Package Text
    • copy the appropriate python code
  • In sublime, ctrl + ~ to show the console
  • Paste the python snippet

Useful RST Packages¶

  • Restructured Text (RST) Snippets
  • sublime-rst-completion
  • RestructuredText Improved (file navigation by header)
  • Omni Markup Previewer (command + option + O: will view in html–disable as “overwrite_toggle” keybinding first)

Installing These Packages¶

Adding a Repository¶

  • use Command + Shift + P and search package to view package control options
  • use Package Control: Add repository
  • input repository url (github, gitbucket, etc.)

Enabling a Package from added Repository¶

  • use Command + Shift + P and search package to view package control options
  • use Package Control: Enable Package
  • choose from the availible packages to enable

Misc Sublime things for me¶

  • enter command mode by pressing esc
  • exit command mode into edit by pressing i
  • ctrl + ~ to show the console
  • ctrl + [ exits insert mode
  • for “normal text mode” disable vintage package (using package manager)
  • changed enable overwrite to super(command) + option + -
